Meet Morgan

Meet Morgan! Morgan joined Halcyon back in October 2015. He's 16 and is in Grade 11 at Michael A. Riffel Catholic High School.

His favourite piece is the Hallelujah Chorus and his favourite Halcyon memory is from his first Halcyon Messiah concert in 2015.

Image courtesy of Andrea Norberg Photography
